{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Filter
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’âˆž} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if for every Îµ > 0 there exists an M such that |f(z)-L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemannSphere_atTop_iff_ext [CommRing R] [StrongRankCondition R] {f : R â†’+* â„‚} (L : â„‚) :
    Tendsto (fun z => f z) atTop (ð“ L) â†”
      âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ M, âˆ€ z, M < z.natAbs â†’ dist (f z) L < Îµ := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Filter
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’âˆž} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if
    for every Îµ > 0 there exists an M such that |f(z) - L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemann_sphere_at_infty_iff {f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚} (L : â„‚) :
  Tendsto f atTop (ð“ L) â†” âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ M, âˆ€ z : â„‚, abs z > M â†’ dist (f z) L < Îµ := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open Filter
open Complex
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’âˆž} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if
    for every Îµ > 0 there exists an M such that |f(z) - L| < Îµ whenever âˆ¥ z âˆ¥ > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemann_sphere_infty_iff {f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚} (L : â„‚) :
  Tendsto f (comap Complex.abs atTop) (ð“ L) â†”
    âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ M, âˆ€ z : â„‚, Complex.abs z > M â†’ dist (f z) L < Îµ := by
  sorry
